survey_brief: This survey aims to understand public preferences and behaviors regarding sustainable urban mobility options, including walking, cycling, and public transit usage.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public transportation for your daily commute?
questions.client_notes: Recommended scale for frequency-based questions. Ensure mobile-friendly dropdown for answer options.

script.question_text: How often do you use public transportation for your daily commute?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable mobility options do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Randomize answer options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable mobility options do you currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What prevents you from using sustainable mobility options more frequently?
answer_options: Prefer the comfort of private vehicles
questions.routing_logic: Shows if Q2 includes 'None of the above' or if Q1 is 'Rarely' or 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Include 'Other' with open-text option for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with conditional open-text.

script.question_text: What prevents you from using sustainable mobility options more frequently?
answer_options: Prefer the comfort of private vehicles
script.routing_logic: Shows if Q2 includes 'None of the above' or if Q1 is 'Rarely' or 'Never'

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bike lanes in your city?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction questions.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bike lanes in your city?

questions.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use sustainable mobility options more often?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use sustainable mobility options more often?

questions.question_text: Have you used a bike-sharing or e-scooter program in the past year?
answer_options: No, but I would consider it
No, and I am not interested
questions.client_notes: Include both frequency and intent options for nuanced insights.

script.question_text: Have you used a bike-sharing or e-scooter program in the past year?
answer_options: No, but I would consider it
No, and I am not interested

questions.question_text: How important is reducing your carbon footprint when choosing a mode of transportation?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point importance scale for environmental impact questions.

script.question_text: How important is reducing your carbon footprint when choosing a mode of transportation?

questions.question_text: Which of the following incentives would most likely encourage you to use sustainable mobility options? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to prioritize preferences. Randomize options.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with max selection limit.

script.question_text: Which of the following incentives would most likely encourage you to use sustainable mobility options? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the cleanliness and maintenance of public transit in your city?

script.question_text: How would you rate the cleanliness and maintenance of public transit in your city?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for choosing your current mode of transportation?
questions.client_notes: Include 'Other' with open-text option for unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons with conditional open-text.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for choosing your current mode of transportation?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to switch to a sustainable mobility option if it were more affordable?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point likelihood scale for behavioral intent questions.

script.question_text: How likely are you to switch to a sustainable mobility option if it were more affordable?

questions.client_notes: Collect for geographic analysis. Ensure data privacy compliance.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text input with numeric validation.
